question1: Waa maxay adeegga NameTAG iyo waa maxay faa'iidooyinka shirkadaha iyo noocyada?
answer1: NameTAG waa adeeg ku salaysan is-diiwaangelinta Ethio Telecom oo u ogalaata shirkadaha iyo summadaha inay iibsadaan nambaro sumadeysan oo gaagaaban (sida #Ethio → #38446 #Brand → #27263) wicitaannada soo socda iyo kuwa baxaya ee macaamiisha. Magacaaga NameTAG waxa uu u shaqeeyaa sidii astaanta astaantaada oo waxa uu siiya lambar xidhiidh oo fudud oo lagu xasuusan karo dadka soo waca.
question2: Sideen ugu diiwaan gashan karaa adeegga NameTAG oo aan u helaa nambarka NameTAG lambarkayga ganacsiga?
answer2: Waxaad iska diiwaan gelin kartaa adigoo booqanaya www.nametag.et. Samee akoon shirkadeed adoo isticmaalaya faahfaahintaada shirkada oo sax ah oo soo rar dukumeentiyada shirkada loo baahan yahay. Kadib oggolaanshaha dukumeentiga Ethio Admin waxaad kaydsan kartaa oo aad iibsan kartaa lambarka NameTAG ee aad door bidayso. Waxaad heli doontaa ogeysiis SMS ah mar uu maamulaha adeega NameTAG xaqiijiyo oo uu ansixiyo dukumeentiyada la soo galiyay.
question3: Dukumeentidee ayaa loo baahan yahay si loo furo xisaabta NameTAG?
answer3: Si aad u furato koontada NameTAG ee shirkadda: waa inaad soo gelisaa saddexda dukumeenti ee saxda ah: 1) Warqad Codsi: 2) Shatiga Diiwaangelinta: iyo 3) Shatiga Ganacsiga.
question4: Waa imisa wakhtiga lagu qiyaaso dib u eegista iyo ansixinta dukumeentiyada?
answer4: Waqtiga lagu qiyaaso in dib loo eego oo lagu ansixiyo dukumentiyada waa 24-48 saacadood. Waxa aad heli doontaa Qoral ama ogaysiis nambarkaaga mobilka koowaad ee diwaangashan marka dukumeentigu ogolaado ama diido maamulaha Waxaad heli doontaa SMS ogaysiis lambarkaaga gacanta ee aasaasiga ah ee diiwaangashan marka dukumeentigu ogolaado ama diido maamulaha.
question5: Ma soo celin karaa dukumeentiyada shirkadda haddii uu diido maamulaha ama haddii aan dokumentiyo cusub ka helo dawladda?
answer5: Haa waxaad dib u soo dhejin kartaa dukumeentiyada haddii uu diido maamuluhu ama haddii aad ka hesho dukumeenti la cusboonaysiiyay waaxyaha dawladda.
question6: Sideen ku bixin karaa kharashka lanbarkayga NameTAG?
answer6: Kadib ogolaanshaha dukumentiyada waa inaad ku dhamaystirtaa lacag bixinta telebirr 24 saacadood gudahood si aad u hesho nambarka NameTAG ee kaydsan.
question7: Sideen u xafidan karaa NameTAG ee dookheyga oo hadhow u gadan karaa akoonka telebirr?
answer7: Waxaad akoon ka samaysan kartaa nametag.et oo dooro oo kaydso nambarka NameTAG ee doorashadaada. Waa inaad ku dhamaystirtaa lacag bixinta xisaabtaada telebirr 24 saacadood gudahood si aad u iibsato NameTAG. Haddii lacag bixinta lagu bixin waayo 24 saacadood gudahood: magaca NameTAG waa la sii dayn doonaa waxaana loo diyaarin doonaa kuwa kale si ay u iibsadaan.
question8: Goorma iyo sideen ku bixin karaa khidmadda soo noqnoqota ee lambarkayga NameTAG?
answer8: Adeegga NameTAG wuxuu ka jari doonaa khidmadaha soo noqnoqda ee telebirr sida ku cad wareegga biilasha ee aad dooratay (saddexdii biloodba mar ama sannadkii). Wareegga khidmadda soo noqnoqda waxay bilaaban doontaa laga bilaabo taariikhda diiwaangelinta adeegga.
question9: Ma ku bixin karaa khidmada isdiiwaangelinta nambarka NameTAG ee shirkaddayda aniga oo isticmaalaya akoon kasta oo telebirr ah?
answer9: Haa waxaad ku bixin kartaa ujrada NameTAG ee bilowga ah (kharashka isdiiwaangelinta + khidmadda soo noqnoqda ee ugu horeysa) adoo isticmaalaya akoon kasta oo telebirr ah. Bixinta guulaysata ka dib NameTAG waxaa lagu xidhidhi doonaa lambarka mobaylka ee la bixiyay.
question10: Ma ku bixin karaa khidmadda soo noqnoqota ee nambarka shirkadda NameTAG nambarka gacanta ee ka duwan kan ku xiran?
answer10: Maya kharashka soo noqnoqda ee shirkaddaada NameTAG waxa kaliya oo lagu bixin karaa iyada oo la isticmaalayo akoontada telebirr ee nambarka gacanta ee ku xiran NameTAG. Intaa waxaa dheer nambarka gacanta ee ku xiran waa inuu aqbalaa oo oggolaadaa amarka telebirr si uu awood u yeesho bixinta khidmadda soo noqnoqda ee tooska ah.
question11: Ma ku bixin karaa nambarka NameTAG khidmadda soo noqnoqda aniga oo isticmaalaya hababka kale ee lacag bixinta sida xisaab bangi ama mobaylka hawada?
answer11: Maya koontada NameTAG ee shirkadda is-diiwaangelinta iyo khidmadaha soo noqnoqda waxaa lagu bixin karaa oo keliya iyadoo la isticmaalayo koontada telebirr.
question12: Sideen waci karaa wicitaanada kuwa kale anigoo isticmaalaya nambarada NameTAG?
answer12: Marka nambarkaaga NameTAG uu shaqeeyo si fudud u billow wicitaanada bixida adoo adeegsanaya madal NameTAG adigoo garaacaya horgalaha # iyo Magaca Xisbiga B-taga ama lambarka moobilka (#4343 ama #097xxxxxxxx). qaataha waxa uu arki doonaa wacitaankaga oo ka imanaya #(NameTAG lanbarkaaga) ee aan ahayn nambarka gacanta.
question13: Sideen ku aqoonsan karaa in wicitaanku ku jiro lambarkayga NameTAG ama mobilka?
answer13: Marka wicitaanku ka soo galo MagacaagaTag waxay ku tusi doontaa horgale \#\ ka hor lambarka mobaylka ee soo wacaha (tusaale: #0912345678) kaa caawinaya inaad kala saartid wicitaannada gacanta ee caadiga ah iyo wicitaannada NameTAG.
question14: Ma samayn karaa wicitaano aan xadidnayn anigoo isticmaalaya nambarkayga NameTAG?
answer14: Haa waxaad samayn kartaa wicitaano aan xadidnayn oo shabakad ah (gudaha shabakadda Ethio Telecom) adoo isticmaalaya NameTAG. Si kastaba ha ahaatee wicitaanada caalamiga ah iyo wicitaanada inta aad wareegayaan laguma taageero adeega NameTAG.
question15: Imisa ayaa laygu dalaci doona wicitaanada ka baxa lambarkayga NameTAG?
answer15: Markaad wacdo bixitaan addoo isticmaalaya Horgalaha NameTAG (#) Ethio Telecom waxay kugu dalaci doontaa sida ku cad qorshaha xirmada lambarkaaga gacanta.
question16: Ma u isticmaali karaa qorshaha Xidhmada Codkayga ee wicitaanada ka baxaya lambarkayga NameTAG?
answer16: Haa qorshahaaga xirmada codka caadiga ah waxaa loo isticmaali karaa wicitaanada ka baxaya lambarkaaga NameTAG. Wicitaanadan waxa laga dalaci doona hadhaaga wakhtiga hawada sida ku cad qorshaha xirmada
question17: Sideen u dejin karaa lambarka sirta ah oo aan lambarkayga NameTAG uga ilaalin karaa wicitaannada soo socda ee aan la rabin?
answer17: Waxaad awood u siin kartaa sifada Wicista Soogalootiga ah ee PIN ama sirta si loo ilaaliyo lambarkaaga NameTAG. Deji PIN hal-god ah oo la wadaag xiriirada aad aaminsan tahay. Kaliya dadka soo wacaya ee geliya PIN saxda ah ayaa awoodi doona inay ku xidhmaan lambarkaaga NameTAG.
question18: Dejinta PIN ee wicitaanada soo galaya ma ikhtiyaari mise waa qasab?
answer18: Sameenta PIN ama sirta ee wicitaanada soo galaya waa ikhtiyaari. Sida caadiga ah nambarkaaga NameTAG wuu furan yahay qof walbana wuu ku soo wici karaa si waafaqsan jadwalkaaga qeexan. Haddii aad rabto in aad xaddiddo wicitaannada soo socda oo aad u ogolaato kaliya kuwa soo wacaya ee galaya PIN-ka waxaad awood u yeelan kartaa sifada PIN.
question19: Sidee saaxiibaday iyo qoyskaygu ugu wici karaan nambarkayga NameTAG iyaga oo aan galin PIN-ka Wicista Soogalootiga ah?
answer19: Waxaad saaxiibadaa iyo qoyskaaga ku dari kartaa liiska caddaymaha ee qaybta PIN ee Wicista Soogalootiga. Soo wacayaasha liiska cad-cad waxay ku xidhi karaan lambarkaaga NameTAG iyaga oo aan galin lambarka sirta ah.
question20: Ma ka saari karaa PIN-ka wicitaanada soo socda?
answer20: Haa waxaad ka saari kartaa PIN-ka wicitaanada soo socda wakhti kasta adigoo u maraya marinka maamulka ama USSD.
question21: Sideen u maareeyaa adeegayga iyo wicitaanada soo socda?
answer21: Waxaad si buuxda u maareyn kartaa adeeggaaga oo ay ku jiraan goobaha wicitaanka ee soo galaya ee xannibaya xannibista iyo jadwalka iyada oo loo marayo marinka shabakadda ee shirkadda www.nametag.et.
question22: Sideen u ballansan karaa lambarkayga NameTAG si aan u helo wicitaannada macaamiisha ee ku salaysan saacadahayga shaqada?
answer22: Xariirka shabakadda waxaad dejin kartaa jadwalka wicitaanka ee NameTAG kaaga si aad u hesho wicitaanada soo socda oo keliya inta lagu jiro saacadaha shaqada ee aad door bidayso. Wixii ka baxsan saacadahaas wicitaanada si toos ah ayaa loo xannibi karaa sida dejimahaaga.
question23: Sideen u xannibi karaa ama uga furi karaa lambarrada gacanta ama lambarrada kale ee NameTAG?
answer23: Waxaad si fudud u xannibi kartaa ama ka furi kartaa nambarada gacanta ee gaarka ah ama nambarada NameTAG adigoo isticmaalaya koontadaada NameTAG maamul dejinta adeegga ee marinka shabakadda.
question24: Immisa lambar oo NameTAG ah ayaan iska diiwaan gelin karaa si ka dhan ah akoonkayga shirkadda?
answer24: Waxaad iska diiwaan gelin kartaa ilaa shan (5) nambarada NameTAG ee hoos yimaada koontada hal shirkad ee NameTAG.
question25: Sideen uga bixi karaa adeegga NameTAG?
answer25: Waxaad ka bixi kartaa xubin kasta oo NameTAG ah iyada oo loo marayo marinka shabakadda. Marka la iska diiwaan geliyo kharashka soo noqnoqda mar dambe lama dalaci doono. Waxaad haysataa 7 maalmood oo aad dib-u-diiwaangeliso isla NameTAG ka hor inta aanay u helin kuwa kale inay iibsadaan. Muddada nimcada ka dib nambarka NameTAG waa loo sii dayn doonaa dadweynaha lamana soo celin karo
question26: Waa maxay sharciyada wicitaanka haddii aan jadwaleeyo wicitaanadayda soo socda?
answer26: Dejinta wicitaanka ee la qorsheeyay waxay kuu ogolaanaysaa inaad hesho wicitaano kaliya inta lagu jiro waqtiyada la doortay. Wixii ka baxsan saacadahaaga go'an wicitaanada soo gala ee NameTAG kaaga waa la xannibi doonaa oo dadka soo wacayaa ma awoodi doonaan inay ku helaan ilaa jadwalkaagu dib u bilaabo.
question27: Ma bedeli karaa lambarkayga NameTAG ee jira?
answer27: Haa waxaad bedeli kartaa lambarkaaga NameTAG ee jira adiga oo isticmaalaya ikhtiyaarka laga heli karo bogga Shirkadda. Markaad bedesho nambarka cusub ee NameTAG waa inaad ka iibsataa nambar NameTAG cusub liiska jira oo dooro qorshaha xirmada. Kharashka soo noqnoqda ayaa lagu dabaqi doonaa sida ku cad Magaca cusub ee la doortay.
question28: Marka aan beddelo Magacayga jira ee cusub oo aan u beddelo NameTAG kii hore ma ku xidhnaan doonaa lambarkayga?
answer28: Maya. Marka aad bedesho Magacaaga jira oo aad dhammayso lacag bixinta NameTAG hore ayaa la sii deyn doonaa. Waa inaad ka doorataa NameTAG cusub liiska jira oo dooro qorshe xidhmo. Kharashka isdiiwaangelinta iyo kharashka soo noqnoqda ayaa lagu dabaqi doonaa iyadoo lagu salaynayo magaca cusub ee la doortay ee NameTAG.
question29: Waa maxay Mandate-ka telebirr sideese ku aqbali karaa si aan uga shaqeeyo khidmadda soo noqnoqota?
answer29: Telebirr Mandate waa hannaan oggolaanaya NameTAG inay si toos ah uga jarto khidmadda soo noqnoqota koontadaada telebirr. Marka aad iska diiwaangeliso adeega NameTAG oo aad bixiso lacagta bilowga ah: waxaa laguu soo diri doonaa codsi oggolaansho (telebirr Mandate). Codsigaas waa inaad xaqiijisaa adigoo adeegsanaya lambarkaaga sirta ah (telebirr PIN) marka aad ka hesho farriinta Pop-Up ee lambarkaaga.
question30: Maxaa dhacaya haddii aanan aqbalin codsiga waajibka telebirr ama aanan oggolaan NameTAG?
answer30: Haddii aadan aqbalin codsiga Mandate ee telebirr oo aadan oggolaan NameTAG kharashka soo noqnoqda si toos ah ugama go'i karo akoonkaaga telebirr. Natiijo ahaan adeegaaga NameTAG waa la hakin doonaa 30 maalmood ka dib taariikhda ujrada soo noqnoqda ee xigta.
question31: Sideen u aqbali karaa codsiga Waajibaadka telebirr haddii aan ku guul daraystay in aan u fasaxo NameTAG mar hore?
answer31: Haddii aad hore ugu guul daraysatay inaad aqbasho codsiga Mandate telebirr: waxaad gali kartaa bogga shabakadda ee NameTAG. Dashboard-ka waxaad ka heli doontaa ikhtiyaar aad ku oggolaato lacagaha soo noqnoqda ee telebirr adigoo gujinaya badhanka 'Aqbal'. Markaad gujiso ka dib waxaad heli doontaa ogeysiis pop-up ah lambarkaaga mobilada ee diiwaangashan. Ku xaqiiji codsiga adiga oo gelaya PIN-kaaga telebirr. Marka la xaqiijiyo waajibaadkaaga waa la hawlgelin doonaa waxaana wareegtada khidmadda ee soo noqnoqonaysa la hawlgelin doonaa taariikhda la filayo.
question32: Haddii ujradayda soo noqnoqota ee jira NameTAG la sugayo ma bedeli karaa NameTAG?
answer32: Haa laakiin waa inaad marka hore bixisaa kharashka soo noqnoqda ee jira ee NameTAG oo ay la socoto isdiiwaangelinta iyo kharashyada soo noqnoqda ee NameTAG cusub.
question33: Ma bedeli karaa nambarkayga mobilada ee ku xidhan shirkadayga NameTAG?
answer33: Haa waad bedeli kartaa nambarkaaga gacanta ee ku xidhan Magacaaga jira. Laakiin waa inaad bixisaa khidmadda soo noqnoqda ee aan caadiga ahayn haddii ay jiraan nambarka mobilada ee existig.
question34: Maxaa dhacaya haddii aan iloobo erayga sirta ah ee koontada NameTAG ee shirkadda?
answer34: Waxaad dib u dejin kartaa eraygaaga sirta ah adigoo isticmaalaya ikhtiyaarka 'Forgot Password' ee ku yaal portal-ka. Si aad sidaas u samayso waa inaad gelisaa lambarkaaga gacanta ee diiwaangashan iyo magaca isticmaalaha. OTP ayaa loo soo diri doonaa nambarkaaga gacanta si loo dhamaystiro habka dib u dejinta erayga sirta ah.
question35: Maxaa dhacaya haddii aan bixin waayo kharashka soo noqnoqda lambarkayga NameTAG?
answer35: Bixinta khidmadda soo noqnoqda waa qasab si loo joogteeyo adeegaaga NameTAG. Haddii bixinta khidmadda soo noqnoqda ay ku guuldareysato akoonkaaga telebirr adeegaaga NameTAG waa la hakin doonaa ka dib 30 maalmood oo lacag la'aan ah.
question36: Ma ka xidhi karaa akoonkayga shirkada NameTAG?
answer36: Haa: waxaad codsan kartaa in la xiro akoonkaaga NameTAG ee shirkadda. Marka hore: waa inaad baajisaa is-qorista (unsubscribe) dhammaan lambarrada NameTAG ee kuu shaqaynaya. Intaas ka dib: waxaad codsiga xiritaanka ka soo gudbin kartaa barta (portal-ka). Codsiga waxaa dib u eegi doona oo ansixin doona maamulaha adeegga NameTAG. Marka la ansixiyo: xogta shirkaddaada (profile): lambarrada NameTAG ee ku xirnaa: iyo dhammaan dukumintiyadii aad soo gelisay ayaa si joogto ah looga saari doonaa nidaamka NameTAG.
ind_question1: Waa maxay adeegga NameTAG iyo waa maxay faa'iidooyinka shakhsiyaadka?
ind_answer1: NameTAG waa adeeg isdiiwaangelin ku salaysan oo Ethio Telecom u ogolaanaya shakhsiyaadka inay iibsadaan nambarada summadaysan ee gaagaaban (tusaale #32843) wicida soo socota iyo kuwa baxaya. Magacaaga NameTAG waxa uu u shaqeeyaa sida aqoonsigaaga shakhsi ahaaneed oo waxa uu siiya lambar xidhiidh oo si fudud loo xasuusan karo dadka ku soo waca.
ind_question2: Sideen iskaga diiwaan geliyaa adeega NameTAG oo aan u helaa nambarkayga NameTAG?
ind_answer2: Waxaad iska diiwaan gelin kartaa USSD adigoo garaacaya *883# ama bogga internetka ama abka mobaylka. Kadib markaad doorato NameTAG: waxaad dhamaystiri kartaa diiwaangelintaada oo aad dhaqaajin kartaa adeeggaaga.
ind_question3: Sideen ku heli karaa NameTAG cusub oo aan ugu xidhi karaa nambarkayga gacanta ama mobilka ?
ind_answer3: Waxaad iska diiwaangelin kartaa adeega NameTAG adigoo sidoo kale iibsanaya lambar NameTAG ah oo aad doorato. NameTAG-ga cusub si toos ah ayaa loogu xiriirin doonaa lambarkaaga moobilka ee ugu weyn. Qofka ku soo wacaya wuxuu kugula xiriiri karaa adigoo garaacaya NameTAG-gaaga (tusaale: #32843): adiguna waxaad heli doontaa wicitaannada soo galaya oo wata hormaris (prefix) ah #<lambarka wacaha>. Marka aad dib u wacdo adigoo isticmaalaya hormarinta #<09xxxxxxxx>: qofka aad wacayso wuxuu arki doonaa in wicitaanku ka imanayo NameTAG-gaaga (tusaale: #32843).
ind_question4: Sideen ku bixin karaa kharashka isdiiwaangelinta lambarkayga NameTAG iyo kharashka soo noqnoqda?
ind_answer4: Magacyada caadiga ah ee NameTAGs (ka diiwaan gashan USSD) waxaad ku bixin kartaa adigoo isticmaalaya hadhaaga wakhtiga hawada. Haddii aad dooran doonto kanaalka Shabakadda ama App-ka si aad uga diwaangashato NameTAG lacag bixinta adeegga waa in lagu dhammaystiraa telebirr.
ind_question5: Sideen u xafidan karaa NameTAG ee dookheyga oo hadhow u gadan karaa akoonka telebirr?
ind_answer5: Waxaada akoonto ka abuuri kartaa bogga nametag.et adigoo dooranaya kuna xajinaya (reserve) lambar NameTAG ah oo aad rabto. Waa inaad dhammaystirtaa bixinta adigoo adeegsanaya koontadaada telebirr muddo 24 saacadood gudahood si aad u iibsato NameTAG-ga. Haddii aan bixinta la samayn 24 saacadood gudahood: NameTAG-ga la xajistay waa la sii dayn doonaa: waxaana loo furi doonaa in ay iibsadaan macaamiil kale.
ind_question6: Ma baajin ama tirtiri karaa Magacayga la ii sii hayo?
ind_answer6: Haa waxaad ka tirtiri kartaa lambarkaaga NameTAG ee kaydsan akoonkaaga oo dooro nambar kale oo NameTAG ah oo aad ku iibsan karto.
ind_question7: Ma kaydsan karaa NameTAG anoo isticmaalaya kanaalka USSD?
ind_answer7: Maya kanaalka USSD ma taageerayo kaydinta NameTAG. Si kastaba ha ahaatee waxaad raadin kartaa nambarka NameTAG ee la heli karo oo si toos ah ayaad u iibsan kartaa adigoo isticmaalaya baaqiga wakhtiga hawada ee mobaylka.
ind_question8: Waa maxay Waajibaadka telebirr sideese ku aqbali karaa si aan uga shaqeeyo khidmadda soo noqnoqota?
ind_answer8: Waajibaadka (Mandate-ka) telebirr waa hab aad u oggolaanayso NameTAG inuusi toos ahah lacagta joogtada ah uga goosto akoonkaaga telebirr. Ka dib marka aad is-qorto: waa inaad xaqiijisaa waajibaadkan adigoo isticmaalaya PIN-kaaga telebirr.
ind_question9: Maxaa dhacaya haddii aanan aqbalin codsiga waajibka telebirr ama aanan oggolaan NameTAG?
ind_answer9: Haddii aadan aqbalin codsiga Waajibaadka ee telebirr oo aadan oggolaan NameTAG kharashka soo noqnoqda si toos ah ugama go'i karo akoonkaaga telebirr. Natiijo ahaan adeegaaga NameTAG waa la hakin doonaa 30 maalmood ka dib taariikhda ujrada soo noqnoqda ee xigta.
ind_question10: Sideen u aqbali karaa codsiga Waajibaadka telebirr haddii aan ku guul daraystay in aan u fasaxo NameTAG mar hore?
ind_answer10: Haddii aad hore ugu guul daraysatay inaad aqbasho codsiga Waajibaadka telebirr: waxaad gali kartaa bogga shabakadda ee NameTAG. Dashboard-ka waxaad ka heli doontaa ikhtiyaar aad ku oggolaato lacagaha soo noqnoqda ee telebirr adigoo gujinaya badhanka 'Aqbal'. Markaad gujiso ka dib waxaad heli doontaa ogeysiis pop-up ah lambarkaaga mobilada ee diiwaangashan. Ku xaqiiji codsiga adiga oo gelaya PIN-kaaga telebirr. Marka la xaqiijiyo waajibaadkaaga waa la hawlgelin doonaa waxaana wareegtada khidmadda ee soo noqnoqonaysa la hawlgelin doonaa taariikhda la filayo.
ind_question11: Ma ku bixin karaa nambarkayga gaarka ah ee NameTAG khidmadda isdiiwaangelinta bilowga ah aniga oo isticmaalaya akoonto kasta oo telebirr ah?
ind_answer11: Haa waxaad ku bixin kartaa ujrada NameTAG ee bilowga ah (kharashka isdiiwaangelinta + khidmadda soo noqnoqda ee ugu horreysa) adoo isticmaalaya akoon kasta oo telebirr ah. Bixinta guulaysata ka dib NameTAG waxaa lagu xidhidhi doonaa nambarka gacanta ee la bixiyay.
ind_question12: Ma ku bixin karaa khidmadda soo noqnoqota ee nambarkayga NameTAG ee nambarka gacanta ee ka duwan kan ku xidhan?
ind_answer12: Maya haddii aad u dooratay telebirr qaab lacag bixin ah adoo isticmaalaya NameTAG Web portal ama Mobile App khidmada soo noqnoqda ee shirkadaada NameTAG waxa kaliya oo lagu bixin karaa iyadoo la isticmaalayo koontada telebirr ee nambarka gacanta ee ku xidhan NameTAG. Intaa waxaa dheer nambarka gacanta ee ku xiran waa inuu aqbalaa oo oggolaadaa amarka telebirr si uu awood u yeesho bixinta khidmadda soo noqnoqda ee tooska ah.
ind_question13: Sideen waci karaa wicitaanada kuwa kale anigoo isticmaalaya nambarkayga NameTAG?
ind_answer13: Ka dib marka aad is-diiwaangeliso: waxaad wici kartaa adigoo isticmaalaya madal NameTAG. Wicitaanada laga sameeyay MagacaagaTAG waxay tusi doonaan nambarkaaga NameTAG kooxda helaysa ee wata horgalaha #.
ind_question14: Sideen ku aqoonsan karaa in wicitaanku ku jiro lambarkayga NameTAG ama nambarka gacanta?
ind_answer14: Wicitaannada soo socda ee MagacaagaTAG waxay la soo bixi doonaan calaamad \#\ ka hor lambarka taleefanka gacanta ee soo wacaha (tusaale. :#0912345678) taas oo kuu oggolaanaysa inaad kalasrtida wicitaannada caadiga.
ind_question15: Sideen u maareeyaa adeegayga iyo wicitaanada soo socda?
ind_answer15: Waxaad maamuli kartaa adeeggaaga NameTAG oo ay ku jiraan adeegga xannibaadda wicitaanka shid ama dami iyo cusbooneysiinta astaanta bogga USSD (*883#) marinka shabakadda ama abka mobaylka.
ind_question16: Sideen u dami karaa ama u dari karaa lambarkayga NameTAG si aan u helo wicitaano ku salaysan shuruudahayga shakhsi ahaaneed?
ind_answer16: Waxaad ku maareyn kartaa dejinta wicitaankaaga soo gelaya adigoo isticmaalaya bogga internetka ee moobilka ama liiska USSD. Tani waxay kuu ogolaanaysaa inaad damiso wicitaanada soo gala ama dami lambarkaaga NameTAG iyadoo lagu salaynayo baahiyahaaga.
ind_question17: Waa maxay sharciyada wicitaanka haddii aan damiyo wicitaanadayda soo socda?
ind_answer17: Haddii aad doorato inaad damiso wicitaanada soo socda waxay ahaan doonaan ugu badnaan 10 maalmood. Muddadaas ka dib goobta NameTAG waxay si toos ah dib ugu soo celin doontaa wicitaanada soo gala.
ind_question18: Sideen u xannibi karaa ama uga furi karaa lambarrada mobilka ama lambarrada kale ee NameTAG?
ind_answer18: Waxaad si fudud u xannibi kartaa ama uga furi kartaa lambarrada A651:A660 adigoo isticmaalaya liiska maamulka ee NameTAG ee ku yaal USSD abka ama bogga shabakadda.
ind_question19: Sideen u dejin karaa lambarka sirta ah oo aan lambarkayga NameTAG uga ilaalin karaa wicitaannada soo socda ee aan la rabin?
ind_answer19: Waxaad awood u siin kartaa sifada Wicista Soogalootiga ah ee PIN si loo ilaaliyo lambarkaaga NameTAG. Deji PIN hal-god ah oo la wadaag xiriirada aad aaminsan tahay. Kaliya dadka soo wacaya ee geliya PIN saxda ah ayaa awoodi doona inay ku xidhmaan lambarkaaga NameTAG.
ind_question20: Dejinta PIN ee wicitaanada soo galaya ma ikhtiyaari mise waa qasab?
ind_answer20: Dejinta ama samee PIN ee wicitaanada soo galaya waa ikhtiyaari. Sida caadiga ah nambarkaaga NameTAG wuu furan yahay qof walbana wuu ku soo wici karaa si waafaqsan jadwalkaaga qeexan. Haddii aad rabto in aad xaddiddo wicitaannada soo socda oo aad u ogolaato kaliya kuwa soo wacaya ee galaya PIN-ka waxaad awood u yeelan kartaa sifada PIN.
ind_question21: Sidee saaxiibaday iyo qoyskaygu ugu yeedhi karaan nambarkayga NameTAG iyaga oo aan galin PIN-ka Wicista soo socda?
ind_answer21: Waxaad ku dari kartaa asxaabtaada iyo qoyskaaga liiska caddaymaha ee qaybta PIN ama sirta Wicitaanada soo socda. Soo wacayaasha liiska cad-cad waxay ku xidhi karaan lambarkaaga NameTAG iyagoon galin lambarka sirta ah.
ind_question22: Ma ka saari karaa PIN-ka wicitaanada soo socda?
ind_answer22: Haa waxaad ka saari kartaa PIN-ka wicitaanada soo socda wakhti kasta adoo sii maraya marinka maamulka ama USSD.
ind_question23: Immisa lambar oo NameTAG ah ayaan iska diiwaan gelin karaa si ka dhan ah akoonkayga?
ind_answer23: Macmiil gaar ah ahaan waxa aad ku diwaangelin kartaa hal (1) nambarka NameTAG lambarkaaga gacanta koowaad wakhti kasta.
ind_question24: Ma bedeli karaa nambarkayga NameTAG ee jira oo aan u bedeli karaa nambar cusub oo NameTAG?
ind_answer24: Haa waxaad ku beddeli kartaa lambarkaaga NmaeTAG oo aad ku bedeli kartaa magac kasta oo kale. Magac kasta oo cusub oo NameTAG ah ayaa kaaga baahan doona inaad bixiso kharashka is-diiwaangelinta ee ku salaysan qaybta iyo dhererka. Ujrada soo noqnoqda ee adeegga bishii ayaa lagu dabaqi doonaa si waafaqsan.
ind_question25: Marka aan beddelo Magacayga jira ee cusub oo aan u beddelo NameTAG kii hore ma ku xidhnaan doonaa lambarkayga?
ind_answer25: Maya. Marka aad bedesho Magacaaga jira oo aad dhammayso lacag bixinta NameTAG hore ayaa la sii deyn doonaa. Waa inaad ka doorataa NameTAG cusub liiska jira oo dooro qorshe xidhmo. Kharashka isdiiwaangelinta iyo kharashka soo noqnoqda ayaa lagu dabaqi doonaa iyadoo lagu salaynayo magaca cusub ee la doortay ee NameTAG.
ind_question26: Haddii khidmadda soo noqnoqota ee NameTAG-ga hadda jira ay weli ku xayiran tahay: ma beddeli karaa NameTAG-gayga?
ind_answer26: Haa laakiin waa inaad marka hore bixisaa kharashka soo noqnoqda ee jira ee NameTAG oo ay la socoto isdiiwaangelinta iyo kharashyada soo noqnoqda ee NameTAG cusub.
ind_question27: Maxaa dhacaya haddii aan bixin waayo kharashka soo noqnoqda lambarkayga NameTAG?
ind_answer27: Bixinta khidmadda soo noqnoqda waa qasab si loo joogteeyo adeegaaga NameTAG. Haddii kharashka soo noqnoqda uu ku guuldareysto habka lacag bixinta ee aad dooratay (account telebirr ama Ethio Airtime) ee lambarkaaga moobilka adeegga waa la joojin doonaa waxaana NameTAG laga sii deyn doonaa lambarkaaga gacanta.
ind_question28: Sideen uga bixi karaa adeegga NameTAG?
ind_answer28: Waxaad ka bixi kartaa xubin kasta oo NameTAG ah iyada oo loo marayo bogga internetka ee USSD ama App-ka Mobilka. Marka la iska diiwaan geliyo kharashka soo noqnoqda mar dambe lama dalaci doono. Nambarkaaga NameTAG waa laga saari doonaa lambarkaaga oo nambarka NameTAG ayaa loo sii dayn doonaa dadweynaha oo dib looma soo ceshan karo.
